welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tarrytown, where the charm of a quaint historic village meets the excitement of a bustling city. Known for its rich history, picturesque views, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for Delta and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and their passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines, including Delta Air Lines and Air France.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines, including British Airways and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for 30 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
